verbs.description: Mitt Romney [V: is] laying the groundwork to become spokesman of the Republican Party establishment that 's been steamrolled by President Donald Trump .
[ARG0: Mitt Romney] is [V: laying] [ARG1: the groundwork to become spokesman of the Republican Party establishment that 's been steamrolled by President Donald Trump] .
[ARG1: Mitt Romney] is laying the groundwork to [V: become] [ARG2: spokesman of the Republican Party establishment that 's been steamrolled by President Donald Trump] .
Mitt Romney is laying the groundwork to become spokesman of the Republican Party establishment that [V: 's] been steamrolled by President Donald Trump .
Mitt Romney is laying the groundwork to become spokesman of the Republican Party establishment that 's [V: been] steamrolled by President Donald Trump .
Mitt Romney is laying the groundwork to become spokesman of [ARG1: the Republican Party establishment] [R-ARG1: that] 's been [V: steamrolled] [ARG0: by President Donald Trump] .
